upstream: Software component vendors (e.g., Red Hat, VMware)
downstream: Government agencies (e.g., U.S. Department of Defense, U.K. Ministry of Defence)
Financial institutions (e.g., Bank of America, Goldman Sachs)
Healthcare providers (e.g., Mayo Clinic, UnitedHealth Group)
